In this episode we visit Tel Aviv, the gateway to Israel, aka the White City.
During this visit we will see the old port of Jaffa, we will discover examples of Bauhaus architecture or international style for which this city is famous as well as many other places that make Tel Aviv a vibrant and cosmopolitan city.
